text: Patrick Berthou (born 17 June 1963) is a French rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Meurthe-et-Moselle
title: Patrick Berthou
